item.description: Programming in Physics and Astronomy with C++ or Python (E/A) - physics718 Course Programming in Physics and Astronomy with C++ or Python (E/A) Course No. physics718 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 2+1 4 ST Requirements: Preparation: Basic knowledge of programming and knowledge of simple C/C++ or Python constructs.
